Title: Brüno
Writer: Sacha Baron Cohen (screenplay), Anthony Hines (screenplay), Dan Mazer (screenplay), Jeff Schaffer (screenplay), Sacha Baron Cohen (story), Peter Baynham (story), Anthony Hines (story), Dan Mazer (story), Sacha Baron Cohen (character)
Actors: Sacha Baron Cohen, Gustaf Hammarsten, Clifford Bañagale, Chibundu Orukwowu
Plot: Flamboyant and gay Austrian Brüno looks for new fame in America.
